name: fslreorient2std
author: Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB)
description: A tool for reorienting an image to match the approximate orientation of standard template images (MNI152).

inputs.description: Input image to be reoriented (NIfTI format, e.g. img.nii.gz)
inputs.name: Input image

inputs.description: Output image with the reoriented result (NIfTI format, e.g. reoriented_img.nii.gz). If not provided, transformation matrix is output to standard output.
inputs.name: Output image

inputs.description: File to save the transformation matrix
inputs.name: Matrix file

output-files.description: File to save the transformation matrix
output-files.name: Output transformation matrix
